sentence.Network_en: The delegate moved for a reconsideration of the suggestion.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位代表提议重新考虑这一建议.

sentence.Network_en: You should give it careful reconsideration.
sentence.Network_cn: 你应该仔细地重新考虑一下这个问题.
我无需再作任何考虑就可解除它.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 法律英语词汇 - 御风而行的日志 - 网易博客 ... 说明条款 recitals 复议 reconsideration 弥补；纠正 rectify.
英语构词法_百度百科 ... reassemble（ 重新召集）， reconsideration（ 再考虑）， rearrangement（ 再安排）.
...PERM审理的正常程序，但对于再次审核及否决后要求重新考虑（reconsideration）的案件却没有任何相应的改善举措出台。
Module 4 Things we do教案 ... 课后作业 Assignments 课后反思 Reconsideration 复习句子： What can he/she do.

list.abs: 常用词汇翻译 ... 刑讯逼供 interrogate by torture 行政复议 administrative reconsideration 犹大 collaborator.
the connection between petition and administrative reconsideration system ., 信访与行政复议制度的衔接.

entry.def: If you reconsider a decision or opinion, you think about it and try to decide whether it should be changed.

example.ex: We want you to reconsider your decision to resign from the board...
example.tran: 我们希望你重新考虑辞去董事会职务的决定。

example.ex: This has forced the United States to seriously reconsider its position...
example.tran: 这迫使美国重新认真考虑自己的立场。

means.word_mean: 1. a consideration of a topic (as in a meeting) with a view to changing an earlier decision
2. thinking again about a choice previously made;

sentences.sentence: "he had second thoughts about his purchase"

auth_sentence.content: Some opponents argue the rushed-through constitution should be subject to such reconsideration.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some opponents argue the rushed-through constitution should be subject to such reconsideration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some opponents argue the rushed-through constitution should be subject to such reconsideration.

auth_sentence.content: It doesn't make any sense, so maybe they should do some reconsideration.
auth_sentence.res_content: It doesn't make any sense, so maybe they should do some reconsideration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It doesn't make any sense, so maybe they should do some reconsideration.

auth_sentence.content: They may require a fundamental reconsideration of what it means to be a man.
auth_sentence.res_content: They may require a fundamental reconsideration of what it means to be a man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They may require a fundamental reconsideration of what it means to be a man.
